name: 計量經濟學
restrict: ◎必須先修過【BAU0040  統計學（一）】 ◎課程不開放上修
description: 本課程學生將學到如何估計資料及解讀實證結果。本課程將討論計量經濟的理論基礎和應用，且示範如何以統計軟體R運用在實際的資料上。
goals: 討論隨機變數的測量原理和應用，瞭解資料的機率分佈
討論計量經濟的理論基礎和應用，運用實證研究及解讀實證結果
R統計軟體運用在實際的資料上
syllabus:
1\. Statistics and Econometric Methods; R Primer  
2\. The Philosophy of Probability & Statistics—  Random Variable and Expectation; R Lab  
3\. Regression Analysis: LS Estimation and Inference; R Lab  
4\. Regression Analysis: Residual Diagnosis; R Lab  
5\. Heteroskedasticity Problem & Robustness; R Lab  
6\. Regression Analysis: Discrete Choice Variable; R Lab  
7\. Regression Analysis: Discrete Choice Variable; R Lab  
8\. Simultaneous Equation Regression; R Lab  
9\. Instrumental Variables Estimation and GMM; R Lab  
10\. GMM; R Lab  
11\. Univariate Analysis of Time Series Data: ARMA; R Lab  
12\. Heteroskedasticity Problem in Time Series Regressions; R Lab  
13\. Univariate Analysis of Time Series Data: ARIMA and ADF; R lab  
14\. Multivariate Time Series Regression-- VAR and Causality; R Lab  
15\. Panel Data  
16~17. Panel Data; R Lab  
18\. Endogeneity Problem

methodologies.note: R 軟體運用在實際資料的分析上

grading.note: 具備問題解決與決策制定的能力
具備問題解決與決策制定的能力
